attributes.action: Government to create rules that allow students to cancel uni accommodation
attributes.background: When students signed up for accommodation Covid was at it's lowest and rules were not as strict as they are currently. The new rules for Covid means students no longer want to remain on campus as face to face teaching is suspended for many modules, there's no point of living on campus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
